name: Cakifo
description: Cakifo is a nice, responsive theme built from the rock-solid Hybrid Core theme framework. With its HTML5 markup and support for all the WordPress features you love, it might be the perfect theme and a great starting point for your blog! Other features include a homepage template, content slider, post formats, improved widgets and many more useful features. Customize it with a custom background, logo, colors and fonts â€“ or use a child theme as the theme is very child theme friendly.
author: Jesper Johansen
